name: Asteroids (itch) (Eavalion)
description:
A classic brought to the modern era!

Fly around avoiding incoming asteroids and shoot to destroy them!

Controls:

W,A,D - Player Movement

Space - Shoot

The project can also be downloaded for windows below as well as the source code available for free here: https://github.com/EavalionDev/Asteroids-Game
